Title: Swifthawk Chariots
Intro: Each model in a Swifthawk Charioteers unit is armed with Charioteers’ Bows and Swifthawk Spears.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Aelven Purebreeds are armed with Swift Hooves.

Rules.Name: Graceful Charge
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by this unit if it made a charge move in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Swift And Deadly
Rules.Rule: Swift and Deadly: When you pick this unit to run, you do not need to make a run roll. Instead, add 6" to the Move characteristic of the models in this unit in that phase.In addition, this unit is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and it can move an extra 3" when it piles in.
